meanings.sent1: The osteopaths in the clinic help patients with their bone and muscle health.
meanings.sent2: I visited two osteopaths for my back pain.
meanings.sent3: The group of osteopaths decided to have a bone-themed party.
meanings.sent4: The osteopaths were like detectives, examining the body for clues.
meanings.sent5: The osteopaths' office was filled with diagrams of the human skeleton.

meanings.sent1: Many osteopaths attended the conference to discuss new treatment methods.
meanings.sent2: The waiting room was full of osteopaths waiting to see their patients.
meanings.sent3: The team of osteopaths won the award for their outstanding community service.
meanings.sent4: The field was crowded with osteopaths, each with their own unique approach.
meanings.sent5: The group of osteopaths worked together like a well-oiled machine.
